items.english: Welcome to Caribou!
items.translation: Caribou mein aapka swagat hai!

items.english: Good morning / Good evening
items.translation: Shubh prabhat / Shubh sandhya

items.english: Hi, how are you today?
items.translation: Namaste, aap aaj kaise hain?

items.english: How can I help you?
items.translation: Main aapki kya madad kar sakta hoon?

items.english: What can I get for you?
items.translation: Main aapke liye kya la sakta hoon?

items.english: Would you like it hot or iced?
items.translation: Kya aap ise garam ya thanda lena pasand karenge?

items.english: What size: small, medium, or large?
items.translation: Kitna bada: chhota, madhyam, ya bada?

items.english: Any specific milk? We have oats, soy, and almond.
items.translation: Koi vishesh doodh? Humare paas oats, soy aur badaam ka doodh hai.

items.english: Would you like extra sugar or sweetener?
items.translation: Kya aap extra cheeni ya sweetener chahenge?

items.english: Do you want whipped cream on top?
items.translation: Kya aap upar whipped cream chahte hain?

items.english: Anything else for you?
items.translation: Aapke liye kuch aur?

items.english: For here or to go?
items.translation: Yahan ke liye ya le jaane ke liye?

items.english: I'd like a large latte, please.
items.translation: Mujhe ek bada latte chahiye, kripya.

items.english: Can I have a double shot of espresso?
items.translation: Kya mujhe espresso ka double shot mil sakta hai?

items.english: Make it with oat milk, please.
items.translation: Ise oat milk ke saath banayein, kripya.

items.english: Is there any sugar in this?
items.translation: Kya ismein cheeni hai?

items.english: I'll have a croissant with my coffee.
items.translation: Main apni coffee ke saath ek croissant loonga.

items.english: Where can I find the napkins?
items.translation: Mujhe napkins kahan mil sakte hain?

items.english: Can I have a sleeve for my cup?
items.translation: Kya mujhe apne cup ke liye sleeve mil sakti hai?

items.english: That will be 25 dirhams.
items.translation: Yeh 25 dirhams hoga.

items.english: Would you like to pay by card or cash?
items.translation: Kya aap card ya nakad se bhugtan karna chahenge?

items.english: Can I have a receipt, please?
items.translation: Kya mujhe raseed mil sakti hai, kripya?

items.english: Tap your card here.
items.translation: Apna card yahan tap karein.

items.english: Keep the change.
items.translation: Baaki paise rakh lijiye.

items.english: I recommend our signature blend.
items.translation: Main humare signature blend ki salah deta hoon.

items.english: This drink is very popular today.
items.translation: Yeh drink aaj bahut lokpriya hai.

items.english: It goes great with a blueberry muffin.
items.translation: Yeh blueberry muffin ke saath bahut accha lagta hai.

items.english: Would you like to try our new seasonal latte?
items.translation: Kya aap humara naya seasonal latte aazmana chahenge?

items.english: What's the Wi-Fi password?
items.translation: Wi-Fi password kya hai?

items.english: Where is the restroom?
items.translation: Restroom kahan hai?

items.english: Is this drink dairy-free?
items.translation: Kya yeh drink dairy-free hai?

items.english: My drink is too cold/hot.
items.translation: Meri drink bahut thandi/garam hai.

items.english: I ordered a flat white, but this is a cappuccino.
items.translation: Maine flat white order kiya tha, lekin yeh cappuccino hai.

items.english: Enjoy your drink!
items.translation: Apni drink ka anand lein!

items.english: Have a wonderful day!
items.translation: Aapka din shaandar rahe!

items.english: Thank you for visiting!
items.translation: Aane ke liye dhanyawad!

items.english: See you next time.
items.translation: Agli baar milte hain.
